title: Type releases, worth noting (2.8).
content:
Selected newly released typefaces, February ‘08: ' [Bree](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.type-together.com/ampl_font.php?idpuente=13 "Bree")', by Veronika Burian + José Scaglione _(Type Together)_. ' [Broadband](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.typedifferent.com/ "Broadband")', by/from Büro Destruct _(TypeDifferent)_. ' [Divulge](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.typodermic.com/169.html "Divulge")', by Ray Larabie _(Typodermic)_. ' [Halvorsen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.atf.com.au/font.asp?Font_ID=94 "Halvorsen")', by Wayne Thompson _(Australian Type Foundry)_, ' [Massif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.insignedesign.com/Typeface.aspx?FamilyName=Massif "Massif")', by Jeremy Dooley _(insigne)_, ' [Unit _(Rounded)_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_unit_rounded_ot/ "Unit (Rounded)")', by Erik Spiekermann _(FontFont)_. ' [Ronaldson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.canadatype.com/showfont.php?id=142 "Ronaldson")', by Alexander Kay + Rebecca Alaccari + Patrick Griffin _(Canada Type)_.

Selected new free fonts: ' [Millesime](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.chank.com/freefont_detail.php?sku=1106 "Millesime")', by Gregory W. Jacobson _(Chank / Dead Image Design)_. ' [Unit _(Rounded)_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.fontshop.com/freefonts "Unit (Rounded)")' _(Bold/Demo)_, by Erik Spiekermann _(FontFont)_. ' [Zalamander _(Caps)_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/www.justanotherfoundry.com/Zalamander/index.htm "Zalamander (Caps)")', by Tim Ahrens _(Just Another Foundry)_.

\> [Type releases, worth noting (1.8).](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/for.ma/blog/?p=100 "Type releases, worth noting (1.8)")

_[for.ma/blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023055228/http:/for.ma/blog)_
author: Dav
